The pro is great whether you are using it while the console is docked with a TV or whether you have the tablet on the kickstand and use it on the go. I am incredibly happy with it as it is way more comfortable and usable than the joycon grip controller (which isn't horrible) but the pro is just excellent!

Great controller.  Good feel.  BUT after some time playing (after the warranty period) the left joystick will not react when trying to go forward.  I was able to fix this by taking apart the controller and spraying electrical contact cleaner on the joystick.  It seems to be working fine.  But so many people are having the same issue it will probably happen again.  Simple fix though.

Overall, I love the feel and weight of this controller. However, as others have posted, after a few months of use the left analog stick begins to have issues. In my case, the stick appears to be in the neutral position, however when in the calibration settings, there is a slight constant pull downward. Mine is just barely out of warranty and so I had to pay Nintendo $30 plus shipping and handling to fix it. Great controller, just wish that it lasted.

It's a good controller so long as it works.  The left stick either (1) has a drift problem or (2) has a responsiveness problem.  Unfortunately, this seems inevitable with the current design. I had to get me a proper controller for the switch.  The joy cons are some amazing tech, but they are made for a 4 year olds hands.  Even in the extra grip accessory.  This is a proper controller for a man's hands.  Pairs and wakes the switch in a few seconds.  Can't comment on the amiibo stuff as that's not really my thing.  Battery life is damn good.  Will obviously go down after time but as of right not its been going about 15 hours, still has 50% charge.  Are you listening SONY!!!  That being said I wish it took batteries like my X1 controllers.  Aslo would have like some better colors than just all black.  Not one ounce of color.  And last but not least, PRICE!!!  Nintendo has price gouged every accessory since the original Nintendo.  This controller is no exception.  I paid $50 for it.  Would not have paid $80 for it like others.

This is the most comfortable controller for gaming, hands down. It's always a struggle for people with extra large hands to play video games because the companies have to consider all sizes when designing the primary input devices. The Switch remotes are painfully small for my hands, but this controller made all the difference. It's seamless connectivity and battery life make it #1 next to any competitor models for this console. Love it!

This is a fantastic controller and a far better alternative to the Joy-cons! It's expensive, but works well, is comfortable to use, and has the full suite of features (unlike some 3rd-party alternatives.) I would suggest looking for one used/refurbished or otherwise less than MSRP, and/or getting one for your main usage while getting a few cheaper controllers for less frequent multiplayer gaming.

The Nintendo Switch Pro Controller looks and feels great. I'm able to play much better than just using the Joy-Cons! The pro controller is wireless, can last for up to 40 hours on a single charge, and comes with an included usb cable. It also has hd rumble and supports amiibo! If the pro controller too expensive for you, you could also buy another great Nintendo Licensed wireless controller for $49.99:https://www.amazon.com/Afterglow-Nintendo-Switch-Wireless-Controller-500-137/dp/B07VFCJHFQ/

No issues with joystick drift yet. I really like this controller. I bought it to play Astral Chain with and was not disappointed. I’ve replaced a few joysticks on my joycons now and it’s a pretty easy process so I’m not too worried about that happening with this controller. Great battery life I only have to charge it after really heavy use or after a few days if I’m not using it as much.

I absolutely love the pro controller. It fits well in my hand (feels very similar to my xbox controllers which I'm used to), the battery life is INSANE even after over a year of frequent use, and they gyro and bluetooth work great. My only complaint is the D-pad kinda sucks for old school games, but I didnt take off a star due to how impressed I am with the rest of it overall and the fact that i have other controllers i like to use for retro stuff.

I didn’t think I’d like it as much as I do. Specially for smash bros. If you can just stop being such a purist, and put down the GameCube controllers for a minute. Please, do yourself a favor and pick up a pro controller.  It’s way smoother and has quicker response times. There is some  latency with the gc controllers and the adapter. I’m sure this also works great with every other game but if you’re here because of smash bros , i highly recommend this.

This controller just feels so good in your hands. Once I started using this it is hard to go back to playing with the joycons. This controller has a good grip on it and has a nice weight as well that really makes it comfortable to play with. The only downside is the price point for this controller but other than that it is definitely a controller I would say is a must-have for anyone with a Nintendo Switch.

I only bought this because I had a gift card, it's great quality, but the price tag definitely isn't justified. It's only marked up so much because it's Nintendo, and it's for their latest console. I don't recommend buying it at its full price when you could easily buy it used and have no issues.

This control is extremely comfortable, well built and the battery last even longer than what's described. Charges via Type C USB, as a heads up, regardless of voltage or amps will not charge quicker. Please use the recommended amps and volts. I charge mine with the console itself, just in case. Plus, that Easter Egg is just wonderful...

Bought this to go with my Switch.  LOVE the controller!  Not much more that I can say about it.  Everyone else loves it too; reviews are fantastic!  Makes gaming fun when running Switch off of television!  Highly recommend!

Good battery life, actually fits in your hands,  comfortably at that, charges quickly.Had mine for around 2 years now, battery life, analog stick, and button press quality have not depreciated at all with at least 1000 hours of use.

Seriously get this controller if you plan on docking your switch and playing on a tv. The battery life is fantastic and is so much better than joy cons and the adapter.This basically feels like a xbox controller which I've always been a fan of. Very happy with this purchase.

Fantastic controller. A great option for anyone who is used to the Xbox One, or simply does not want to use the controllers that come with the switch. Cannot stress enough enough how much I love this controller.

I bought two of these are a sale price, which I still find was about $15 too much for a controller that really isn't any better than an Xbox one, but someone is more expensive at full price.  Mind you, Nintendo does not like to put their own stuff on sale...ever, so I guess I count myself lucky for finding this at the price I did while it lasted.  Aside from the price.  The controller is decent enough to play most games with on the Switch for now.  There are plenty of other options out there if you're not that interested in having the rumble support, because other than is being wireless, that's all you're getting for $40 more than the wired controllers.

If you plan on playing the Switch mostly in docked mode, and playing it all the time, then I recommend this controller. At $100 with tax, there is no doubt that this is an EXPENSIVE controller. If you only plan on playing the Switch occasionally, and the Joycon grip is totally acceptable for you, then it's probably a good idea to wait for a sale or something. But if you plan on playing Zelda, Arms, Splatoon, etc a crap ton (and you have big hands) like me, it's worth it.

El Joy-Con Pro Controller es el equivalente del Pro Controller para el Wii U pero con algunas mejoras. El diseño del control es muy bueno, se siente bien al tacto y los botones se encuentran bien distribuidos. Tiene sensores de movimiento, vibración y a diferencia de la versión anterior tiene funcionalidad para utilizar los amiibos directo sobre el control. La duración de la batería es excelente, mucho mayor que la que los controles inalámbricos acostumbran tener. Ampliamente recomendable, su único aspecto negativo es que el precio del control es sumamente elevado, aún encontrándolo en oferta.

While the Joy-Con grip does the job for most of the currently available titles on the Switch, I've never been especially used to nubby analog joysticks of the kind you'll find on both the 3DS and the Switch proper. I always found they lacked travel and anything resembling a comfortable weight, which makes handling anything close to precision aiming a difficult prospect for me. Splatoon 2 and Breath of the Wild are, notably, two of the titles I own that I almost never play in handheld mode. Most of everything else works fine on the go, but these two games always brought up issues of comfort or adaptability.That said, while this controller works perfectly and can even sync with a PC providing you have a Bluetooth receiver on hand - an extra five bucks essentially nets you a perfectly worthwhile wireless controller for PC gaming - I have to admit that it's fairly pricey. It works flawlessly and could maybe stand to have less clicky shoulder buttons if I had to be nitpicky; but the Pro Controller's biggest drawback is its price tag. As a Canadian, paying a hundred bucks after taxes for something I can pick up in wired form or out of a third party for a fraction of the price hurts more than a little. You do pay for a sense of quality and for what has to be the best battery life in a wireless controller in the industry - this puppy essentially packs a 3DS' battery pack on its own, netting you a spectacular forty consecutive hours on a single charge - but it still does sting quite a bit.
Good build quality, fairly comfortable.Despite the price this is not up to snuff with what I consider actually matters as a gamer.

Vale la pena por $1,500 pesos, por más no, sus acabados, materiales y funcionalidad son de primera, no vas a sentirte defraudado, se siente que va a durar muchos años, viene con un cable usb-c te recomiendo comprarlo vendido y enviado por amazon para que no te lleves sorpresas, llegó sellado de fábrica.
Good control. No problems so far.
What was the controller that I've been using?! (The one came with the Switch.) This controller makes your game playing experience so much better!Pros:

I was never sure about how much I would enjoy the Nintendo Pro Controller - I was really hesitant to buy it, but eventually decided to give in. The controller feels absolutely great in your hands (it's a pretty decent size though so if you have smaller hands, it may not be as comfortable). The feel of the plastic is really smooth and the controller is easy to grip. All of the buttons are great and the triggers have really nice feedback and click to them. The rumble features and gyro are also pretty excellent, never had any issues. The controller came packaged perfectly with no damage, and is just really awesome to use. Definitely would recommend.

What I like about this is that it has weight when you use it. You're aware of the product in your hands in a good way. Controls are responsive, though I did notice some lag in one game but I think it only happened in that particular game. (Animal Crossing: NH - moving items in the inventory problems).The charge lasts quite a long time which is a good thing.

This is the official Nintendo Switch Pro Controller. It has every possible features to support your Nintendo games like, HD rumble, motion control, NFC reader, etc. It is expensive compared to other controllers but those controllers lack many features that are in the Pro Controller. If gaming experience is your priority then you must get a Pro Controller. It is worth your investment. Especially, if you play docked.

Excelente control, para cualquier juego de Switch. Si estás acostumbrado a los joycons, las palancas del Pro se sentirán más grandes y sensibles al principio. El sensor de movimiento funciona a la perfección. El d-pad es muy bueno para plataformeros 2D como Mario Maker o los juegos de NES y SNES.Es fácil de emparejar, sólo hay que conectarlo con el cable una vez al Switch y ya. No sé cuánto le dura la batería, nunca se me ha acabado, lo conecto de vez en cuando pero no diario.

El Joy-Con Pro mejor mando qué hay respecto a comodidad, duración y extras, como el giroscopio y el NFC para los Amiibos.El HD Rumble es genial, aunque un poco más “leve” que en los Joy-Con. Al no haber simuladores de carreras en el Nintendo Switch, no veo inconveniente en que los botones Z sean digitales en lugar de analógicos.

My son wanted this b/c my 7 yr old grandson kept beating him on Switch games.  It's not cheap, but supposedly it gives you an advantage on action games. They both gave me thumbs up when asked what they thought of the device.
Was bought for a gift
way better than joy cons
I really liked the feeling of holding it. It was fun while it lasted. Many people said that this controller rarely got drift, but I got it 2 months after purchase.Nintendo, fix this.
FeelS great, very sturdy. Not too heavy. It’s just right. I wish I had bought this a year ago.
Good quality and so comfortable play game using it

Aunque al principio tenía mis reservas por que los botones se me hacían muy grandes y altos, después de jugar Super Mario Odyssey y Donkey Kong me he convertido en creyente: es un gran control.El diseño es discreto lo cual agradezco, Nintendo ha dejado atrás los diseños que parecen sacados de cajita feliz de McDonald's.

Seamos sinceros, no llegaste a la publicación por accidente y te pusiste a leer los comentarios por aburrimiento...(bueno quizás si, no juzgare como pasas tu tiempo) pero bueno, si estas aquí es porque ya te llama la atención el producto y este control si representa una diferencia en el uso de la consola, pase un tiempo solo usando los joycon y en modo portátil es genial (sigo usándolos en este modo) pero al poner la switch en la tv, es cuando se disfruta tomar este control pro, créanme que no es lo mismo poner los joycon en la base que incluye la consola.

This is a great addition to include with your Nintendo Switch Console.  The Joy Cons and the Grip that is included with the Switch Console provide a suitable alternate to merge both Controllers together. However for any Gamer, especially an entry level or Hard Core Gamer, this is the Controller you need.  It is slightly bigger than the Controllers for other Game Brands but the feel, look and comfort is next to none.  I found it easier when playing either Mario Kart Deluxe and Lego Marvel Superheroes. This is not to imply the Joy Cons are not suitable for the Switch, they are great because there are Games that are designed specifically to use the Joy Cons either individually or collectively.  Again, the positives about this Controllers, and with the Joy Cons, it's quite versatile and anyone can use them.This Pro Controller is Wireless and includes a USB Cable to allow you to charge the device when required.  You can definitely play and charge the Controller at the same time however the cord is not significantly long enough; which would require you to sit closer to the Dock and TV screen.  Pairing the Controller is automatic and you choose directly from the On Screen Menu which Controller you wish to use.  The amazing part, you can swap between Controller and Joy Cons at any point during your Game.  This is a fantastic feature with the Nintendo Switch Console as well as the simplicity to toggle between Controllers.

Me encanta mi Nintendo Switch pero estoy acostumbrado a controles un poco más "robustos" que los Joy-cons incluidos con la consola. El Pro-Controller es exactamente eso, un control más robusto para los que estamos acostumbrados a los controles del Xbox o Playstation. Pero fuera de eso no incluye funciones adicionales (como la opción de conectar los audífonos al control como en las otras consolas) por ello los consideres caros.Debo mencionar, como un punto positivo, la larga duración de la batería de este control. Y el excelente servicio de envío de Amazon.

Love the controller - and is very similar to the Wii-U version, but feels more "beefy".  Charges via USB-C, like the Switch itself.Bonus - it comes with a USB-C to USB cable, so you can plug it into your switch's doc and have it charge when not in use.

It’s not a bad controller but it’s definitely not Nintendo’s best. Sticks are great and buttons all feel good, it is night and day compared to a set of JoyCons. It has all the bells and whistles of the JoyCons like motion, NFC and Switch wake up plus it’s battery life is leagues above anything in the current gen market, it should be an industry standard.Button placement could have been better. Having the plus and minus so close to the share and home buttons means you’ll be hitting them more than usual. At least for me my thumbs naturally reach to the home and share buttons instead of the other two. The d-pad is terrible. Very mushy and prone to false inputs, I wouldn’t recommend this controller if you’re mostly into 2D fighters and platformers. At best it’s on par with a 360 d-pad, my experience is it’s much worse. Not something you would expect from Nintendo considering their history of amazing d-pads.

Honestly, I don't think I can play with Joy-cons ever again, even with the grip. This is soooo much more pleasant to hold in my adult hands. Even on the go, I'll bring it most of the time. Airplane, use the stand and the pro controller. Etc, etc.The joy-cons would be fine for a slower-paced game, but I find it awkward to play Breath of The Wild without this thing.

Hice el pedido por un pro controller edición Xenoblade DOS VECES (una compra y un reemplazo) y por más que parezca un chiste las dos veces me llegó el control edición Splatoon 2, ahorita ya regresé los dos controles para que me hagan un reembolso y revisen la plataforma por si es que están cruzados los productos, actualizaré este comentario en cuanto tenga el control que quiero.

The controller itself has all the functionalities of a joycon: HD rumble, Amiibo scanning, motion controls. It definitely feels much better than using the joycon grip. The analog sticks are one of the best ones I've used (even compared to the Xbox one controller). The whole controller feels very premium and has a great build quality. The d-pad isn't good on this controller, but everything else works perfectly.The controller is overpriced though. If you play the Switch almost exclusively in handheld mode then don't bother with this controller. Even when docked, I've used the joy con grip for months without any issue. If you really want to enhance your gaming experience with the switch in docked mode, then you might want to consider investing in this controller.

Este control superó mis expectativas, incluso es mucho mejor que mi control de ps4 ya que tiene una duración de batería que sin problemas aguanta una semana o semana y media dependiendo del uso, los botones se sienten robustos e incluso tienen un tamaño ideal para jugar, me gustan tambien los triggers tienen una excelente respuesta.Lo único que no me gustó mucho es que no tiene algún puerto para jack de audio y que conectando unos audífonos puedas escuchar el audio del juego, hubiera sido el control perfecto si hubiera tenido esta función.

Please note this is not the original controller . This is a first copy . No Nintendo branding , no see through fron case . Please search youtube for videos on how to identify a fake controller from the original . I returned it immediately. Thank you Amazon but please quality check the products which are sold via amazon

Este control se siente muy bien desde la primera vez que lo tienes en la mano. Inmediatamente se nota en su peso y construcción que es un control para un jugador serio. Los botones grandes, los joysticks cómodos y un D pad en forma hacen este en la forma definitiva para jugar en el Nintendo Switch (al menos frente al televisor). El control tiene unas 40 horas de autonomía y cuenta con todas las funciones de los joycon (excepto la cámara infrarroja), por lo que no te perderás de ninguna función en los títulos de renombre. Si tienes pensado conseguir un control adicional para el Switch y estas dispuesto a desembolsar una fuerte cantidad, este es el control que tienes que elegir.

Al momento de tener este control en tus manos, es tener la experiencia completa para jugar con tu Switch, se siente bastante ergonómico y cómodo para jugar. Un contra es su precio pero aún así lo consideraba mejor que los Joycon por su diseño, y eso ya es mucho decir. Se compró porque desgraciadamente se dañó el Joycon izquierdo que viene incluido cuando compras la consola (antes del año y entró en garantía para su reparación) para seguir utilizándola mientras se reparaba el joycon, y pensando que al ser un control completo, en teoría más robusto, no habría problema para jugar con el paso de los años, principalmente por su durabilidad. El detalle es que a pesar del alto costo del control (es más caro que un control de PS4) es de pésima calidad (se dañó al año 1 mes de comprado) por lo que seguramente ya no entra en garantía. Curiosamente se dañó de la palanca izquierda (en el Joycon también se dañó la palanca del Joycon izquierdo) por lo que considero es un fallo grave de diseño. Nada que ver comparado con los controles de PS4, la calidad es infinitamente superior, tengo 3 controles que se han utilizado por un poco más de 4 años casi diario y hasta el momento sin ninguna falla. Para nada recomendaría la compra de este control.

Tengo bastante tiempo con el producto, lamentablemente no pude usuar mucho el producto ya que a los 3 meses se descompuso el steck derecho, pese a que la carga de juego que use no fue mucha, tengo otros 3 controles alternativos y solo este medio problemas, si lo compran recomiendo usarlo de forma continua para que detecten a tiempo si cuenta con algún problema.

A pesar de que los joycons pueden hacer muchas cosas(mas que este control), este producto es necesario ya que la sensación es diferente, es prácticamente básico para algunos tipos de juegos y también mas cómodo que los joycons con el grip, ademas si se lo compras a Amazon es mucho mas barato que los joycons(inclusive sin grip) y como ya se dijo, es mucho mas funcional para una amplia gama de juegos por eso personalmente creo que como mínimo cualquiera que tenga el Switch debe de tener un Pro Controller. Así mismo debo decir que no he tenido ningún fallo de ningún tipo con este control en todo el mes que lo he tenido y usado.

Era escéptico de comprar este control, ya que inicialmente estaba pensando que comprar un par de joycon sería la mejor opción, ya que admite dos usuarios en lugar de un usuario fijo; sin embargo, después de meses de jugar con este control y compartirlo con mis amigos, descubrí que ambos productos tienen sus usos y que el control profesional es excepcional por sí solo. Es cómodo con muchas características que incluyen ruido, apuntado de gyro, compatibilidad con amiibo y compatibilidad con muchos juegos. La calidad de construcción también está más allá de las expectativas, ya que este control se me ha caído varias veces, sin daños en el hardware ni daños cosméticos significativos. Sin mencionar que las preocupaciones por el drift no son un problema aquí, ya que los afectados solo fueron los Joy-Con. Es algo caro para un control, pero te digo que vale CADA PESO. Es inalámbrico, la duración de la batería es muy larga, cómodo para sostener durante largas sesiones y construcción de ALTA CALIDAD por todas partes. Construído para perdurar. Creado para el abuso. Te va a encantar. ¡Muy recomendable!
A must have for any switch owner.The controller is quite expensive when compared with other controllers, but it's definitely worth it.

I bought this controller because I wanted one with a good D-pad so I thought I should go with the official pro controller from Nintendo. What a mistake... The D-pad is the worse I ever experienced. It's always registering incorrect inputs, for example when pressing right or left, it will also register a up press. This makes most game unplayable. In Tetris 99, your blocks will fall rapidly because of the controller registering a "up" press. In Mario Maker, Mario will not move when pressing left/right since when combined with the unwanted ''up'' press, the game think you are trying to make a diagonal move which isn't supported. Make your research on Google, every pro controller having the same problem, you must take it apart and shim the d-pad with some tape and partially cover the 4 d-pad electrical contacts. Then the controller is Ok'ish, still registering incorrect inputs, but less frequently. This is unacceptable from Nintendo at this price. If you still buy after reading this: Be prepared to take your brand new controller apart to fix it yourself.

Estaba un poco indeciso sobre comprar el control pro por su alto precio pero gracias a amazon y sus increíbles ofertas estuvo a un precio irresistible y tuve que aprovechar y la verdad no puedo estar mas contentísimo con el resultado por que es otro mundo alado de los joy-con.Los joy-con son buenos controles pero son mas portátiles que para sesiones largas en la casa y es donde principalmente un servidor juega, este control me gusto ya es relativamente grande a lado de los joy-con desde sus sticks hasta sus botones principales A,B,Y,X e incluso sus botones L y R son grandes, ahora que anduve jugando Breath Of The Wild no me agradaba mucho esos botones me trababa al hacer algunas acciones pero con este nuevo ya nada que ver se siente muy robusto y con excelente agarre.

The Switch is a great system but the Joycons are a bit weird. Even when using them with the grip/holder I don't find them ergonomic.The Pro Controller solves this problem with a more traditional style controller with 2 analog sticks, a D-pad, and plenty of buttons including 4 shoulder buttons. Easy to set up and pair an then start playing.

Este control te puede servir de distintas formas. Tenerlo significa que tienes otro tipo de control con el que jugar y si solo tienes los 2 joycon que venían con la consola te sirve para tener otro jugador y además si juegas solo y se te están descargando los joycon puedes cambiar al mando pro fácilmente y poner a cargar los otros y viceversa. Además de ser cómodo también tiene un largo periodo de vida de la carga y muchas veces no te tienes que preocupar por eso. Viene con cable USB para conectar al Dock para que se cargue mientras juegas pero yo recomiendo cargarlo cuando no se esté jugando y con el cable de corriente que viene con el switch porque debido a su larga duración de la batería también toma su tiempo en cargarse totalmente si le queda poca batería. Lo recomiendo totalmente a los que quieren un mando de dos manos y lo recomiendo sobre los otros mandos de hori ya que esos son alambricos y el control pro tiene ventajas sobre estos además de ser inalámbricos  ya que tienen lector NFC, control de movimiento y vibración HD, que los mandos de hori no tienen estas funciones

I needed another set of controllers for the Nintendo switch and I was back and forth on which ones to choose. Should I get another set of Joy-Cons or the Pro Controller? The Joy-Con controllers are pretty amazing, use them as 1 unit, or separate them out. Track motion with them or connect them directly to the switch. What the Joy-Con controllers are capable of is impressive, but this multi-functionality comes at a cost. They aren't the most precise controllers nor the most comfortable, and once I used the Pro-Controller this became even more obvious.The Pro-Controller is one thing and one thing only, a great controller. The buttons and sticks are more precise and give you much more control over the game. The grip is better and more comfortable and the layout is simply more intuitive. Playing some games almost felt like an entirely new experience as the added precision from the Pro-Controller made accomplishing some feats much easier than they ever were with the Joy-Con's. If you plan on any serious gaming I feel the Pro Controllers are a must. The Joy-Cons are serviceable and fine for some games, but the added control from the Pro Controller is worth it.

Playing with this is a literally a night and day difference compared to the joy cons.... The range of motion is incredibly expanded, the build quality, responsiveness, the sheer perfection in the way your hands wrap around this makes it a joy to hold and use. Be it mario odessey or mario tennis aces, there is a level of comfort which you cannot achieve with the joycons. And i've not even tried zelda with this yet since i got it last evening. Zelda definitely felt awkward in handheld as well as with the joy-grips in docked mode. This should easily make it super comfy to use. I had first thought it'll be an expensive add on but dang this thing now means i'm never going back to the joycons at home. Be it docked or handheld mode. Outstanding.

Dudé mucho en comprarlo por su elevado precio, pero vale cada centavo. El control para empezar es inalámbrico, con alrededor de 30 a 40 horas de batería. Tiene una calidad impresionante en materiales. Si estás acostumbrado a jugar con controles de Xbox, este será como sentirte en casa (solo que el botón A y B están invertidos vs Xbox). El control además tiene lector de amiibo, cosa que los genéricos no tienen. Es una gozada, especialmente para jugar zelda o Smash brothers. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.

Lo compré exclusivamente para jugar en modo TV, tremendo!La vibración HD se siente tan bien, tan precisa que dan ganas de hacerlo vibrar a propósito, por cierto la calidad es muy buena, jugué aproximadamente unas 10 horas con la carga que ya traía y vaya que si dura, de hecho nunca se acabó hasta el siguiente día después de otras 3 horas, los joysticks son muy cómodos, el tamaño perfecto que ofrece gran comodidad justo como en mi otro control DS4, los botones de sienten suaves, en general, excelente control muy bien diseñado y con todas las capacidades necesarias, una vez más Nintendo nos muestra que es capaz de crear maravillas y de por si todo el set del Nintendo switch lo es.

Portato da Babbo Natale alla mia bimba per giocare a Splatoon2 su Nintendo Switch. E' un controller PRO originale marchiato Nintendo, che con il suo bluetooth 3.0 consente di giocare a distanza comodamente seduti in poltrona mentre la Switch è collegata alla TV, ma non solo! Infatti, impostando nei settaggi della switch  questo controller pro come primario rispetto ai joycon, vi permetterà di estrarre la Switch dalla base collegata alla tv, di appoggiarla su un supporto (anche uno usato per appoggiare i tablet) e senza usare i joycon di comandare l'intera Nintendo Switch  e giocare in qualsiasi posto ci faccia comodo. Oltre alla comodità,  è importante sapere che questo controller pro ha incorporati i sensori di movimento (ovvero il giroscopio); questi sensori facilitando il controllo dei movimenti fanno veramente la differenza nel controllo in gaming. Inoltre questo controller pro ha anche il sensore NFC, e cioè è quel sensore che permette, appoggiandoci sopra un amiibo Nintendo, di interagire con esso salvandoci dentro le partite, le configurazioni personali dei mii e attraverso il salvataggio dei dati di gaming nell'amiibo di ricevere per i vostri inkling di Splatoon vestiti e  armi omaggio gratuite in base al raggiungimento di punteggi prefissati. Questo controller pro viene fornito unitamente ad un cavetto usb per la ricarica, che così può essere attaccato per la ricarica in qualsiasi trasformatore di corrente usb (che non è in dotazione), come quello che sicuramente avete già in dotazione per i vostri cellulari.  Una volta carico la durata della batteria interna è super,  vi permetterà di giocare anche per più di 8 ore consecutive... veramente eccellente! Impossibile assegnare meno di 5 stelle anche se costa caro (pagato a Dicembre 2018 euro 69,77)Dimenticavo una cosa importante... per far vedere questo controller pro alla nintendo switch basta collegarlo temporaneamente con il cavo usb in dotazione direttamente in una presa della base della Nintendo Switch. La Switch così effettua automaticamente l'allineamento del controller e lo attiva. Per vedere come si fa basta andare su youtube cercando "come sincronizzare il controller pro alla Nintendo Switch" e troverete i video di spiegazione su come "sync" ovvero allineare e rendere primario il controller pro rispetto ai joycon in dotazione.

If you aim to play Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, or other precise control advantage games like Dragonball Fighter Z, etc. then this is a godsend. It's build quality is excellent and the buttons plus the stick respond very well to input. The rumble is very strong too.

When I received my parcel, not only was it left on my doorstep for several hours without a doorbell, knock, or notification, but I also opened the package (which was really well sealed) to find a live bug in it, running around and trying to fly. It's an Asian lady beetle, an invasive species that also bites people. Absolutely unacceptable from Amazon and not expected from such a large company. It was dealt with and all would have been well if the controller worked fine, but it didn't. It synced to my Switch perfectly, but as soon as it was synced, I started to experience the dreaded "joycon drift" where the joystick registers movement even though you're not touching it. It's fully calibrated and updated, but I still experienced the drifting.Returned it and will be looking elsewhere.

Este es un buen control, bastante cómodo en la mano, muy buena distribuciones de botones y palancas.Tiene buen peso, se siente de buenos materiales, buen sentimiento en los gatillos (aunque en realidad son botones)

Después de 4 meses de uso empezó a tener el problema conocido como "drifting", nintendo se rehusa a vender controles que si funcionen para su consola que ya en serio deberian renombrar a "Nintendo Drift".  He comprado 2 de estos pro controles y unos Joy-Cons y todos los controles ya tiene exactamente el mismo problema, todos los controles del Nintendo Drift estan exageradamente caros y parecen estar diseñados para fallar en menos de un año. No soy el único con este problema, es un problema muy común y Nintendo esta siendo demandado por varias personas por esto. Que decepción.

My first controller was delivered defective, at least I had hoped it was defective.  Prior to preparing a return, I tried calibrating the controller but the right stick was broken, would not work at all.  Amazon shipped me a replacement right away (one day service) which really impressed me and the moment I paired the replacement controller with my Switch, it worked flawlessly (I felt so relieved).When I first picked up the Switch, I said NO WAY will I pay this much for a controller but then I read countless positive reviews saying it is so much more comfortable that X-box controllers and especially the controller that comes with the Switch.  Once I started playing, I no longer felt bad for paying $100 (I do believe it is overpriced but it is amazing).  I am blown away with how good this controller is, it fits incredibly well in your hands, the controls feel so much better and the battery life is unbelievable!!!

My Joycons were starting to experience drifting, and I wanted to get a more permanent replacement so I could play singleplayer games like Fire Emblem and Breath of the Wild without struggling. I decided to purchase the Pro Controller, and it's been amazing. The wireless connectivity has never failed, and the battery life is extremely long. It comes with its own cable that you can plug into the Switch so you don't need to buy another cable. The controller is a little on the pricey side, but this also includes the official Nintendo brand. It also has motion detection which some of the unlicensed controllers lack, so if you want that, then you need this controller.

El diseño y colores del control pro de edición especial Xenoblade Chronicles 2 es muy agradable para la vista, también al ser muy comodo para jugar y tener la mayoria de mismas funciones que los Joy-cons, el pad digital se siente mejorado a su versión de switch pro controller regular pero aun le falta mejoras en ese apartado. Si quieren animarse por lo colorido que es, este control es lo qe recomiendo al igual para los fans de la serie Xenoblade Chronicles.

Por el precio uno esperaría que este control casi no tuviera input lag, pero tiene bastante, y conectado al cable tiene más input lag aun que mediante la conexión wireless. El left stick de pronto no registra los inputs cuando se hacen rápidamente. Pongo 4 estrellas porque con la mayoría de juegos estos problemas son imperceptibles, pero en juegos como Smash Bros son una verdadera molestia y te pueden costar la victoria.

Much better to play with for long periods than using the joycons (even when both joycons are slid into the joycon controller). I've only been using this specific unit for about 100 hours but it's been flawless. My partner has used the same product purchased 5 months ago for over 1000 hours of gameplay (SSBU, Pokemon Sword/Shield, and ACNH) without any issues. No drift!

I love the feel of this controller, the buttons, the grips, the sticks, hand position.  About the only place where expectations felt short where battery life.  I think the battery life is fine and comparable to most other wireless controllers I have.  But most people make this out to have a crazy long battery life where they do not need to charge it for weeks on end - that is far from the case for me.  I am happy it came with a USB-C charging cable (I suppose it really had to though), so 5 stars seems realistic in my opinion.

Es el mejor control para jugar comodamente cualquier juego en tu Switch, tenía mis dudas por el alto precio y espere hasta que estuvo en un precio aceptable. La verdad es que no me arrepiento, los materiales en el control son muy buenos y cómodos, he jugado Smash Bros Ultimate y es una maravilla, jugar Zelda con los JoyCons puede ser muy cansado, pero con este control puedes estar inmerso por horas en el juego y no tienes ninguna molestia.Mi recomendación es que esperen a que el precio baje, actualmente esta muy caro, un precio justo es entre $1,300 y $1,600 no más de eso.

Received this controller the other day. First impression immediately when opening the box was how comfortable and well constructed it was.Setup was effortless, plugged the included USB into the switch and USB type C into the controller and it immediately synced.

I first noticed there was no stickers to seal the box... Then I noticed there is no charge cable? Then looking at the controller I could see it is scratches and scuffs all over it and one of the joy sticks have a circle of a good years wear of use, complete with a dried coffee stain. NOT HAPPY I payed $89 plus tax and shipping for THIS?

I ordered a second pro controller and it was defective. When switching from left key to right key and vice versa, it inputs a Up key and it was impossible to play the game(tetris).Check your buttons if they input correctly in the controller option in the main menu. I did firmware update and console update following the official website troubleshoot manual but nothing changed. Regardless, i have had only good experience with my first pro controller and it is just unfortunate I have to write this review.

I did my research before I bought this, looked at all the other products offered and read the reviews before choosing to buy this.Yes, it's more expensive than the others but It's a Nintendo product, so that's what you're paying for.  It's wireless, works perfectly out of the box, no hassle, no problem having it connect, charging cable can plug into the switch base, and it will wake the switch by pressing the home button.  It also vibrates just like the joycons and holds a charge for a couple days at least.  I used it for 4 hour gaming sessions over the course of a few days and didn't have to charge, it so battery life seems good.

As far as controllers go this isn't bad, you could do much much worse. But an Xbox one controller plus an adapter is much cheaper than this and the Xbone controller imo feels much better, but the most popular adapters have issues.This thing's D pad sucks, it's common knowledge it sucks. It's soft on the top inputs and stiff on the bottom ones, and will sometimes roll over and read two inputs at once, but that aside the rest of the controller is very well done, buttons and sticks feel good, PC compatibility is great and the battery life is exceptional. It's just a REALLY hard sell at 90 dollars. You could do a lot worse though, I guess.

I don't have any experience with controllers for other systems like Xbox or PlayStation, so I can't compare this to anything else, but I do really like it as its own item.  I think the main improvement is the analog stick accuracy, but it's really only necessary/appreciated in "intense games" (like shooters, racing games, etc).  I tried it with my platformers (Odyssey, Spyro, etc.), and found that I preferred the response of the analog sticks on the Joy-cons.The only thing that I would change is that I would add two depressions in the back where the ends of your middle fingers rest when holding the controller to make it a bit more comfortable.

El control tiene un precio un poco elevado, pero la calidad del producto bien lo vale. Es cierto que los Joycons funcionan de maravilla en el modo portátil, sin embargo el usarlos junto con el grip se siente algo incómodo, en especial por el tamaño de los botones y la distribución de los joysticks. El pro controller me ha dejado totalmente satisfecho. Es perfecto para la mayoría de los juegos y su tamaño es perfecto (para mis grandes manos), los materiales son de calidad y la batería es considerablemente duradera. Ampliamente recomendado si quieres expandir tu experiencia con el Switch y convertirlo en una verdadera consola de casa cuando no esté en modo portátil.

Este control ha recibido excelentes reseñas y casi siempre mencionan la comodidad al utilizarlo en modo TV, pero cabe recalcar que la batería de este control es de las mejores que hay, puedes pasar semanas enteras sin tener que volver a cargar la batería. A diferencia de los Joycon, este control me ha funcionado sin problema alguno. El precio es un poco elevado pero a final de cuentas se paga por  un producto de gran calidad.Actualización: Después de dos años de uso cambio mi calificación inicial de 5 a 4 estrellas, ya que después de un tiempo las palancas del control no responden correctamente o mandan señal de movimiento cuando se encuentran en posición neutral.

The joy-cons are great for some games but for every other this controller is ideal. It molds to my hand perfectly and the rumble is better then the PS4 and Xbox controllers. I'm not a fan of motion control and I'm glad I can turn it off. Never used the amigo function that just seems like a money grab to me. All that said its expensive! double the price of the enhanced wireless controller. So I basically paid $40 extra just for the rumble feature. I cant recommend this to anyone. You just have to ask yourself is the rumble, motion and amigo capabilities worth the extra $40, if not get the power A enhanced controller.

Entre los controles furris que trae la consola original, este aparato si te ayuda, mas si eres manón o torpe de dedos, al ser mas robusto no andas echando las bilis cuando presionas demasiado fuerte los joystic. Aguanta un buen rato cargado. En general si eres de los que echa espuma por la boca -como yo- cuando el control se convierte en un problema al jugar, compratelo. Claro, si eres rico, porque entre consola, juegos y de mas monerias, tal vez deberias pensar en comprarte un auto.

Great controller with a battery life second to none for a home console controller. The pricing is ridiculous, and greedy though. If you want to play action, and platforming titles with no drawbacks such as Bayonetta 2, Mario Odyssey, this is a must own controller.
Simplesmente excelente. Analógicos são precisos e mais confortáveis do que os joycons padrões.

Love the controller, hate the price.  Definitely overpriced, but its one of them things you need to have if you have a switch.  Given a choice most people will ask for this controller over the standard joycon controller.  Feels better in your hand, solid construction, fingers don't hurt after a few hours of gaming.

The Pro controller for the switch is one of the most comfortable Controllers I have held in a long time. Everything fits perfectly. The Sticks work well and have a good pushback to it. the face buttons are bigger which makes it easier to find. The shoulder Buttons are very comfortable.Then there is the D-pad. This is the only reason why I don't give this controller a perfect score. For some reason, The D-pad has a tendency to hit up when I'm pushing the Right. It's very frustrating when Playing Zelda and I'm in the heat of a battle and I'm quickly trying to change to different weapons only to be getting the Wrong inventory. This doesn't seem to be an isolated incident as I've been reading others have been going through the same problem. Everything else about this controller is perfect.

Nada mejor para jornadas largas de juego y para quien tiene manos grandes. Es bueno darle un respiro a los joy cons normales.EDITADO: Con el tiempo, un año de haberlo comprado y utilizarlo un par de veces a la semana, el joystick izquierdo se corre hacia abajo en los juegos. Busquen en internet, es un problema general de este control. Esperaba calidad impecable a la que nos tiene acostumbrados nintendo. Por el precio, recomendaría buscar otras opciones que no tienen este problema y el precio es asequible, una buena opción es 8bitdo.

This controller is a very nice addition to Nintendo Switch. If you own a Switch, I would recommend getting one (or better yet, get a special edition if you'd like). But if you are getting it for PC. I would recommend Xbox One controllers instead. The reason is that while both controllers would feel very nice in hand with subtle differences(one being the buttons on this has a softer feedback when pressed). You can get Xbox One controllers at a lower price with a lot more style options. It is rare to see this controller going on sale. For the same price, you can get an Xbox One controller + wireless adapter(if necessary) or almost 2 regular Xbox One controllers when on sale.

El pro controller funcionó perfecto, pero lo compré principalmente para corroborar si la conexión inalambrica de mi switch estaba mal y no eran mis joycons... y en foros dicen que se debería poder estar a más de 5 metros mientras no exista nada bloqueando la señal... al parecer mi Switch es la que tiene problemas con la señal, ya que no puedo estar a más de un metro sin que se desconecte, y con los joycons mucho menos a pesar de haber sido reparados por Nintendo, y el otro nuevo par que tengo parece tener sospechosamente el mismo problema que mis viejos Joycons...Pero el Pro controller llegó bien, completo, se siente increiblemente cómodo, al principio se siente un tanto raro al estar acostumbrado a los sticks de los joycons... compraría otros 3 para cuando salga Smash Bros <3

If you're like me, you probably thought that the joy con and controller shell were completely fine to use to play most games. However, the quality and the comfort of the controller is far superior to the Joy con controller shell combo that it cannot be overstated enough. As far as drawing comparisons to other controllers that are currently available, I would compare it mostly to the PlayStation 4 controller as far as comfort and hand feel, but with the superior control sticks of the Xbox One controller.Buttons don't have the same clicky tactile feel as the joycons do, which personally for me is a plus as they respond a little bit more like a button would on a traditional controller. As well, the shoulder buttons have a lot more of a solid durable feeling as opposed to the joycons slightly more flimsy feedback. The biggest win for the Pro Controller has to be the control sticks. They offer a level of control that you could not possibly get on the joycons. Where is I would consider the joy con control sticks to be completely serviceable, they still feel like a slightly upgraded 3 DS Circle pad. The Pro Controller is not even in the same ballpark, giving you a much more sturdy and reliable feeling control stick that doesn't feel like it's going to break if you're doing a control stick intensive game such as a fighting game or racing game.

Phenomenal controller!  This is more comfortable than the controllers from the other big consoles and has great button throw and response, as you would expect from Nintendo.  USB-C is welcomed as everything is moving towards that, making this controller more future-proof.  Great battery life too, easily outlasting the controllers on my PC and other game consoles.Some people have reported accuracy issues with the d-pad, but I have not experienced anything of the sort.  I have played a number of action games that require very precise d-pad movements and have not had a single slip up.  If some people are in fact having issues with their Pro Controller's d-pad, then they must have defective units.  Mine is perfect.

Esta increíble la ergonomía del control, comparado con otros controles (Xbox y Gamecube), tus dedos meñique y anular caben a la perfección, los botones tienen una gran velocidad de respuesta, se regresan rápido por lo que combos como el raging demmon en street fighter son más fáciles de hacer, las palancas se regresan rápido y quizá según el gusto son demasiado fáciles de mover pero te acostumbras a los 2 minutos, los gatillos se presionan elegantemente y son bastante grandes para mejorar la comodidad, suenan todos y cada uno de los botones de forma espectacular y no sientes que se vaya a romper, la entrega fue bastante buena, incluso llego 1 día antes de lo previsto y en perfectas condiciones, trae un cable extra para cargarlo y le dura bastante la pila, sin mencionar que el cable también sirve para cargar tu switch y es de USB, por lo que puedes cargarl@ en el coche o si consigue un cubo transformador de USB a luz como el de un IPhone lo puedes cargar prácticamente donde sea.
nous avons briser 2 joystick des manette original , j'ai donc decider dacheter celle-ci et wow tres bon achat j'en veux une deuxième maintenant !!

Desde niño he cuidado mis consolas y mis controles (desde el NES). Todos mis controles funcionan perfecto y eso que hasta la fecha los juego de repente.Pero el control que me llegó la palanca ya no le sirve bien. Todo el tiempo jala abajo lo que causa que sea inservible en muchos juegos. Compré el original pensando "cuesta más pero siempre la calidad vale la pena" pero este no fue el caso

Definitivamente es un must para cualquier dueño de switch tener un pro controller. El diseño, la calidad de los materiales y la durabilidad son excelentes. El tamaño de los sticks y botones es mucho más cómodo que el de los JoyCon, además de que cansa menos tenerlo en las manos durante sesiones de juego largas. Funciona perfecto para cualquier juego excepto Super Mario Party que no tiene soporte para pro controller.

El control definitivamente es más cómodo que usar que los joy-cons, y la batería le dura semanas de juego normal. Se carga con USB-C, por lo que si se agota la pila, en lugar de conectarlo al Switch y acercarte a la televisión, lo puedes conectar con un cuadrito al enchufe más cercano.No obstante, no es tan ergonómico como los controles profesionales de otras consolas, no incluye superficie antiderrapante o extensores de joystick para controlar mejor los movimientos, lo cual se justificaría, creo, por el precio. Por eso las 3 estrellas.

Al principio estaba bien, las primeras 2 horasAl cabo de un rato, me empece a dar cuenta de que muy escasas ocaciones cuando dejaba ir el stick, digamos que de derecha, el personaje giraba a la izquierda (como si se pasara de la posicion neutral), semanas mas tarde me di cuenta que el boton r a veces no funcionaba al orecionarlo, pero como no soy gamer hardcore, todo esto lo pase por alto, no fue hasta hace unas semanas, el control empezo a detectar movimiento de la palanca derecha. Al comunicarme con latamel, me dijeron que la garantia es de 3 meses. Un asco de control por un precio extremadamente elevado

La pedí el viernes 16 de noviembre y llegó el lunes 19, es original, se conectó rápidamente a la nintendo y sin problemas, se siente cómodo y de buena calidad, el tamaño es cómo el control del xbox en tamaño, muy cómodo y práctico, la pila dura excelente.Lo compré en $1,753 pesos por Amazon México ya al día siguiente lo bajaron a $1,578 pesos, hable con el personal de Amazon y no me quisieron respetar el precio más bajo ya que la compra se había concretado, fue lo único malo, de ahí en fuera todo está genial

Maravilla de control, muy cómodo, no te cansa la mano, es original de Nintendo, para Breath of the Wild está al puro centavo, lo mismo para el Smash y juegos tipo Megaman, tiene un agarre suave y firme, los controles análogos son de material suave al tacto y no se resbalan los pulgares. Es una chulada, estuvo en oferta unos días y el precio era de en sueño, hasta le tomé foto porque no creo que vuelva a bajar de esa manera, si no lo compraste en esa oferta ya puedes empezar a llorar en posición fetal.Tiene vibraciones como control de Xbox o PS4 lo que da una mejor experiencia al jugar que con los joy-con.

Sin duda un control que le hace falta al switch. La experiencia de juego mejora bastante, es súper recomendable: ergonomico, suave, aparte de que al ser producto oficial todo los materiales se sienten de mucha calidad.La batería dura 3 sesiones largas de juego (aprox 6 horas cada sesión) y es súper fácil de configurar con la consola. (No se pueden jugar algunos juegos: pkmn lets go y mario party son los que tengo y puedo dar cuenta)

Overall, the quality of the controller is quite high, however, I had purchased this to potentially relieve the need for more GameCube controllers in my life and it just didn't seem to match the feel of the GameCube's controller. Don't get me wrong, I would most certainly recommend this controller to people craving the ability to play the switch with a separate controller, however I would suggest that people that have grown accustomed to the GameCube controller to maybe look somewhere else.

Llegó el control, en excelente estado como siempre (soy prime). Lo sincronizo con mi nintendo, pongo Super Mario Maker 2, paso un par de niveles normalitos, todo perfecto, comparado con los Joycon es una muy notable diferencia (nada que un mando de Xbox one, no tenga). Juego un nivel que requiere movimientos rápidos de la cruceta (Dpad) y OH SORPRESA, es tan imprecisa que frustra (presionas atrás-adelante y hace atrás-arriba, lo que provoca que lances los caparazones hacia el cielo en vez de hacia el frente. Para ciertos "trucos" kaizo se requiere precisión absoluta, cosa que este mando no ofrece). Tuve que abrirlo el mismo día, y hacer una pequeña "reparación" que vi en YouTube, funcionó, pero es lamentable que Nintendo presente su control PRO con severa falla. En fin si piensas usar el mando sin la cruceta, todo correcto, para juegos 2D es imposible a menos que le metas mano para arreglarlo.

The controller arrived in pristine condition. It feels great in my hands while I'm playing games. The battery life also lasts a really long time off a single charge. I only purchased this because of serious joycon drift issues (all 6 of my joycons were basically useless) and I was afraid to buy another set of faulty joycons. The pro controller is not as comfortable as holding two separate joycons in each hand and i've heard that the pro controller will eventually also experience some type of drifting issue, which is why I am deducting a star. But so far so good.

This controller is simply the best. Great feel in hand, good position of large buttons, and great battery life.  I charge this thing after 20 or so hours of play.Furthermore it works really well with steam! It connects natively to my pc with bluetooth, no dongles no hassle.

El control es muy bueno, se siente robusto y cómodo. Sin embargo, todos los controles switch pro traen un defecto de diseño en que por el propio uso normal la palanca o joystick va a empezar a soltar un polvo blanco que se mete dentro del control, y esto ocasiona que se empiecen a registrar movimientos en la palanca incluso sin que la toques.En mi caso tardó 10 meses en aparecer el problema, pero aparentemente tuve suerte, ya que investigando un  poco vi que a la mayoría de las personas les aparece este problema a los 6 meses o antes. Hasta ahora este problema no tiene solución ni manera de evitarse, lo cual es inaceptable para un control de nintendo y de este precio.

This is pretty expensive as far as controllers go, since my Xbox One controllers only cost about $50...but for me, I think it has been worth it. I never had any issues using Joycons on the paddle controller that came with my Switch, but now that I've used this Pro controller, I must admit that I like it much better. The build quality seems very good and it feels great in the hands. If you play a lot of Switch and can justify spending the money, I think it's definitely worth it.

I love the game so much I had to purchase the special edition controller to go with the game. I don't see any difference between this and my regular pro controller other than aesthetics but I'm happy with my purchase regardless. I've had it for about a week now and I'm enjoying every second of it. I'd only really recommend it if you're willing to pay the extra money for a cosmetic difference though. Any Xenoblade fan willing to pay the extra cash should be happy with their purchase and in my opinion, this is the best pro controller design as of this date. Beats out both the Splatoon and Smash controllers.

El control tiene calidad en los ensamblado asimismo en los plásticos & botones, las palancas se sienten sólidas y que serán durables, quizá el precio de este control sea elevado pero vale la pena cada peso, ya que cuenta con el lector de amiibos, giroscopio, acelerómetro, una excelente batería de una duración aproximada de 40 horas.Es un control muy ergonómico, se adapta muy bien a tus manos, no cansa al pasar de las horas, lo recomiendo totalmente.

This controller is truly fantastic and addresses almost all the issues I have with the joy-cons, while sacrificing almost none of the functionality (apart from games that specifically requires separate joy-cons for certain functionalities, for example some moves in Super Mario Odyssey or other games). The build quality is excellent, the larger D-Pad is much appreciated and the battery life is simply PHENOMENAL even several months on. However, the price is quite the inhibition, it is very expensive. I believe it is a matter of opinion whether or not the price justifies the quality or if it's simply the traditional Nintendo tax. I fall into the latter category which is why I cannot give this product 5 stars, but do not be fooled, this is an excellent controller and probably the best way to play your switch in TV mode for almost every game on the platform.

Control pro para jugar de una forma más cómoda tus juegos preferidos (checar compatibilidad con juegos).Lo malo es que siento que ya no duran las palancas como el wiiU al checarlo te das cuenta que después de tiempo de usarlo empieza a fallar la palanca como los joycons :(

note - i caught these while they were on sale for 30$ off regular price, at that price point, they're a fantastic deal. easily one of nintendo's best designed controllers in both build quality and comfort in hand. they really feel like they're worth what companies charge these days for controllers. if you ever catch them on sale, treat yourself, they're so much better than trying to use the joycons.

Este mando para el Switch es una estupenda opción para todos aquellos que pudieran encontrar los joy cons regulares un poco pequeños o hasta frágiles.Su diseño es elegante, sólido y funciona con cualquier título de la consola, ya sea en modo TV o en modo portátil, proporcionando una experiencia de juego superior, especialmente si eres un videojugador apasionado o que gusta de un modo de juego intenso.

Essendo abituato alle console da casa rispetto a quelle portatili, ho deciso di acquistare il Pro Controller e devo dire che la giocabilità risulta davvero migliore rispetto a quello fornito in dotazione con la console (per capirci, quello in cui si infilato i 2 Joy-Con). Per cui mi ritengo molto soddisfatto e consiglio decisamente l'acquisto, soprattutto a chi, come me, viene da anni di gioco con le console casalinghe.

As a hardcore gamer I could never get used to the crappy joy con controllers. There cheap the roam and even when installed into the controller piece the controller feels too small and awkward. This is the answer. At first I thought it was a little pricey but it’s tottally worth it. I only wish I bought it when it first came out. Very well built controller. Similar feel to Xbox one controller but buttons are in different spots. Highly recommend escpecailly if you hate the joy cons like I do

The controller works much better than the two joysticks together that came with the console. Never had connection problem so far, unlike the original sticks. It also feels more comfy. For the longer run when playing, I guess this controller's much better.My only grip is the price, but gaming is expensive.

I received it in perfect condition. As a controller itself, it’s far superior to the Joy-Cons. It feels better in the hand than the Xbox One or PS4 controllers. It has a very good battery life too. So far I’ve played Legend of Zelda and MarioKart on it and it plays like a charm. I got it on discount(₹4999). It’s slightly on the expensive side(when not on discount) but still worth it.

I had originally purchased the off-brand controller and returned it the next day - you definitely get what you pay. While the nintendo pro controller is expensive, it is worth it! It's built well, has a good weight to it, is comfortable to hold even as someone who has small hands, and the battery life is AMAZING. Love it!

El producto llegó antes de lo esperado y en perfectas condiciones. Muy satisfecho con la compra.Yo solía jugar a la Switch con el «Comfort Grip» y se jugaba bien, sólo bien. Pero al usar el «Pro Controller» la experiencia mejoró demasiado. Es un control increíblemente cómodo, es un «Must have» para los dueños de una Switch. Es el mejor accesorio que puedas comprar. El diseño es elegante y minimalista, los botones están situados en el lugar indicado. Es muy cómodo. Se juega Super Smash Bros. Ultimate maravillosamente.

Although costly by today's standard, comparing with other competitors in the gaming ring.The pro controller feels good and yet right in the palm of my hands. It is a necessity if you plan to play long hours at tabletop or TV mode, otherwise your hands gonna feel cramped holding the joycon grip that came with the Switch. One nifty feature is that you can use the Switch as a TV monitor when play with the pro controller and the joycons in 2 player mode!

Es un excelente control tanto para juegos casuales como en juegos hardcore, el agarre es excelente, el tacto con los botones es perfecto, la vibración HD es perfecta es algo que le falta en mejorar a los mandos de la competencia, sin excelentes para jugar smash ya que esta diseñado para el uso rudo, pero también se siente fantástico en juegos un poco más casuales como en Zelda:BotW o Mario Odyssey que son los que exprimen más el uso del mando,  en si tal vez su precio te haga pensarlo un poco, pero si lo ves de cierta manera que lo usarás siempre que juegues con viejos, presentes y nuevos títulos este control es excelente!!!Nota: Funciona con PC  (W10) tanto en la plataforma de Steam como fuera de ella ( con cierta configuración ), su conectividad en PC puede ser por Bluetooth o por cable, el cual trae incluido.

The pro controller is simply a good controller. It's got a good weight to it that feels solid in my hands when aiming in games like Splatoon and it's also a good size for my hands. I wish there were some other colour options besides black though (that weren't more expensive, ie the smash or Splatoon themed ones). A simple red and blue option like the joycons would go a long way for me. The pricetag feels high but overall worth it.

El Control llegó rápido y en buenas condiciones, solo que tenía un defecto, la palanca izquierda al presionarla con suavidad hacia cualquier dirección y soltarla se seguía registrando la presión y por lo tanto los personajes en los juegos se seguían moviendo, este fallo lo pude solucionar al calibrar la palanca en la configuración de la consola, pero fuera de eso hasta ahora no ha presentado ninguna otra falla, la duración de la batería es excelente, los sensores de movimiento y el lector NFC funcionan bien, recomiendo comprarlo si te gusta jugar mucho en modo TV ya que el control es cómodo y se siente bien en mano.

El control es sumamente cómodo, me gusta más que el control de PS4. Los "cuernos" tienen un grip muy cómodo que te ayuda a sesiones largas de juego. No tengo manera de pesar el control pero es ligeramente más pesado que el de PS4 pero no es nada cansado. El D-pad es sumamente cómodo, ojalá haya juegos de pelea para aprovecharlo.He usado el control para zelda BOTW, Mario kart 8 y puyo puyo tetris y no he tenido ninguna queja por el diseño del control.

The price was tough to swallow but I have to say I'm impressed. Very comfortable to use, and a must have for playing games while docked to a TV.If you're debating whether to get this controller or not, but are stuck at the price: let me defend the price a little bit. I've used many, many controllers. From a build quality perspective, this is right near the top (Xbox Elite holds the first place for quality for me). This controller feels premium.

Muy buen control, se diferencia mucho en calidad a los controles fabricados por otras compañias que no te dan el material y resistencia de este control original de Nintendo.Tal vez el único punto regular de este control es que percibo muy cerca el joystick izquierdo de la cruz y para quienes tenemos manos grandes a veces es estorboso para el juego.

When you buy Nintendo you pay big bucks but you pay for quality. Controls are a tad bigger than the original "slide on" remotes of the Switch but you get used to it quickly. Very smooth. Activating the Amiibo is different, not on the right joystick, more like in the center of the remote... took a few tries to get it right but overall this is a very good hi quality product, I love it.

I ordered this on Saturday and it arrived on the Monday in the middle of the day. On the instructions in the back it suggests that you charge the controller before using it at first, so once I charged it and started to use it, it was so seamless. It immediately connected to the Switch console and the buttons are really nice. I had purchased a somewhat knock-off version of the joy cons because I didn't want to pay full price for new joy cons, and after two weeks the knock-off ones started to lag when I pressed the A, B, and Y buttons so I just decided to get this because I'd heard so many great things. It's only been a few days since I started using it, but I can honestly say from experience that although it might be a bit pricey it is 100% worth it, so don't go for the cheaper option! Go for the real thing.

we bought a knock off before deciding to spend the money on this one. Wish we would have just sent the money. It does make a massive difference having a nintendo branded controller. Much more precise and accurate than the knock off one. Buying 2 more so the kids have some too. Great product with a fantastic battery life.

This controller is a must have if you're playing on the joy-con grip (that I find awkward and not comfortable).It is a very solid controller, feels really nice in your hands - think of a mix between the xbox one and playstation 4 controller.

Honestly best controller from Nintendo in a long time, super solid and fits very comfortably in your hands, batter last a very long time 30-40 hours. I tis fairly expensive but welcome to buying accessories for a new console

Es un control increíble. Los mandos y lo botones se sienten suaves y muy firmes a la vez. Tiene el sensor de movimiento y aparte puede leer amiibos, por si fuera poco puedo conectarlo a la PC y jugar sin problemas ¿qué más podría pedir?El material y el diseño son muy buenos, se nota que son de calidad.
no le compren es un estafador me vino con un control de play3 sin cables en lugar del control switch pro

¿Te hace muy difícil jugar fortnite con los joy-cons? ¿Nunca ganas?El pro controller  mejorará tus estadísticas en fortnite porque hace que el juego sea mucho más fácil de manejar. Los botones son fáciles de acceder y el controller es cómodo para largas sesiones de juego.

At first I thought "wow this is heavy, this isn't going to be comfortable to hold for very long". (as a note, I do have disabilities which can make it difficult to hold objects with even a little weight, and I have some issues gripping things for long).Not with this controller! It's very comfortable to hold and only causes aggravation if I am hold it too tightly. The buttons and joysticks are well placed, and the grip is easy on the hands. I do have smaller band (bit long fingers) so I can see this may be more uncomfortable for those with large hands. It is a bit odd that the triggers are one push and not like the PlayStation or Xbox controllers where  different pressure causes different or greater effects, but Nintendo does do their own thing. I don't see many, if any, of their games needed that feature. Also, the home button is oddly placed, so it can be pushed too easily. Other than that, this is perfect controller for me. No hand cramps, nice textured grip, very responsive with all the features of the joycons, and it feels very solid. 5/5 from me

Este control pro de nintendo switch, es bastante ergonomico, tiene un peso aceptable (no pesa mucho) es un cambio total con los joycons, es mas comodo de usar, super responsivo, tiene todas las funcionalidades de los joycons, con excepción de la camara, el unico problemita seria el precio, no es muy accesible que digamos, pero aprovechen cuando este a buen precio, yo eso hice 😂, super recomendado el pro controller 😉👍

As someone who's used to the standard controller designs of consoles, the Joycons that come with the Switch are a bit small and unsatisfying to hold. The Pro Controller fixes that issue, and makes ton of games more enjoyable to play. The Pro Controller is wireless, which is very convenient, and has a long battery life so that it doesn't require constant charging. As a bonus, it works great for PC games when I prefer using a controller over a mouse and keyboard. Overall it's a great purchase and I haven't noticed any issues - the only real drawback is the high price.

Much better than Joy Cons, no doubt. But it is a hard to justify the price.I'm biased, as I usually use a Gamecube controller, especially for Smash.  I got this to play stuff like Minecraft when I am docked, which demand more buttons than a Gamecube controller can provide.

El producto es buenísimo, super cómodo, los botones son mucho más grandes que los de los Joy-Cons por lo que resulta muy cómodo. Personalmente me parece una excelente para jugar Smash Bros Ultimate y actualmente Mario Maker 2No le doy las 5 estrellas porque a pesar del descuento que tiene este producto en Amazon (el más bajo del mercado) me parece que sigue siendo un control relativamente caro.  Los controles de XBOX y PS4  tienen un menor precio y el nivel de calidad es excelente al igual que el mando PRO del SWITCH, por ello veo un poco desequilibrada la relación costo-calidad.  Aún a pesar de esto es el mejor control que hay en el mercado y si buscas una alternativa porque los Joy-Cons no te resultan cómodos, este es la mejor opción.

I bought this so that I could have a controller to use while I send my joycons in to be repaired for their drift problem, but this one drifts on both sticks right out of the box. Updating the controller, updating the Switch, and calibrating the controller have not helped. Very disappointed.

Al principio dude mucho acerca de comprarlo, pues tengo el adaptador 8bitdo para usar los controles de XBOX One y PS4, sin embargo al recibirlo me percate de la buena calidad y la facilidad de conexión. La textura es muy buena y es muy cómodo. Si estás pensando en comprarlo, vale la pena 100%

I bought it used for like $70 CAD after tax from amazon warehouse and they sent me one that was completely broken. It would sync but none of the buttons would work and the d-pad wouldn't move. Only the joy sticks could be used to navigate the menu. When they say amazon warehouse inspected, they probably just look at it to see if it's physically broken. They don't actually plug it into a switch to check if the damn thing works.

Love the feel of this controller, defintely a must have if you want to play games like Fortnite and Rocket League on the Switch. It feels a lot like the Xbox 360 controller which I loved, plus the quality of the controller as a whole is second to none. The price is pretty steep, but it's put together really well and in my opinion it's worth the extra $10-15 compared to the dualshock 4 and XB1 controller.My only gripe is the triggers don't have as much give as I'd like. I love the old LT/RT on the 360 controllers and I was really hoping for a similar feel, but instead they don't push down that much and it's almost hard to tell the difference between the bumper and the trigger on this controller. I'm getting used to it, but was hoping for a little more give.

I got old version of D-pad, I think. (Old version of Nintendo Switch Pro Controller has issues with D-pad, when you press a direction, say down, you accidentally also press left or right).Otherwise, very comfortable to hold. I played it with almost all games. If it was not for D-pad issue, I would have give this product full 5 stars.

Mi experiencia previa con videojuegos se reducía a portátiles, pero este control es una maravilla. Ligero, con buen agarre, excelente respuesta, una batería larguísima… lo único malo es el precio que puede ser un poco elevado, pero no hay un control mejor. Es además una necesidad con el Switch, dado que se siente que los joy con se van a romper con una sesión animada de Smash.

No se si esto se lo toman como una broma de muy mal gusto, pero en vez de recibir el producto que solicite me dieron uno totalmente diferente al que compre y para colmo fue uno de mucho menor valor. Pésima organización de productos, no recomiendo comprar con ellos en lo absoluto.

El control pro es una compra necesaria para un nuevo dueño de un nintendo switch. El control es de gran calidad, y se siente realmente excelente en las manos. Las palancas son suaves, los botones se sienten muy bien, y es de buen tamaño, especialmente si tienes manos grandes como yo. Es mil veces mas cómodo que los joycon incluidos con el switch. Muy recomendado!

Que mas puedo decir, las mismas reseñas hablan de lo bueno y genial que es este control, cómodo, durable, energía prolongada, fácil recarga, es una maravilla, en realidad ya llevo 2 comprados, ando viendo si compro el 3ero de una vez, porque la verdad me ha encantado, a mi y a mis parientes, es mas como jugar con este control digo yo porque los otros controles los pequeños me desacostumbre de ellos y pues la verdad tienden a ser menos resistentes que un control así como este, lo juegos como: hollow knight, resident evil 5, overcooked y enter the gungeon; se me han hecho mas fáciles y cómodos con este control. Tengo ya 4 meses con el y no ha presentado ningún fallo.

May sound stupid, but this control is a massive improvement over the joy-cons. Even compared to the holster that comes with the Switch to make one control this one has a far better layout. Breath of the Wild is noticeably easily to play with this, and I'm sure games like the new Metroid will be too.I'm giving a 4/5 because of the ridiculous pricing. Other console controllers aren't nearly so high.

Excelente hasta que usas el Dpad para juegos de peleas, o juegos como Tetris, se aprieta en botón de arriba y abajo al apretar los lados, mismo al revés. Hay soluciones en línea en las que tienes que abrir el control y hacerle un arreglo, pero no es ideal.

Bought this to use as a second controller for multiplayer, but I find for most games I prefer using this to the Joycons if I'm using my Switch with a TV. Sits nice in the hand. If you're used to the Joycons, button placement will take a bit of playing time to adjust to. Holds a charge really well so far, too.

The pro controller is miles better than the joycons, and definitely required if you have big hands. The buttons are big and sturdy. The button placement is overall much more accessible, specifically the + and - buttons being in the center rather than the top. The control sticks have significantly better sensitivity than the joycons and a much better rubber grip. Basically no input lag (less than 1ms response time). The controller also has a nice grip in the sides, letting your hands grab it comfortably, and is fairly light.

El producto es excelente, lo he probado tanto en Nintendo Switch, así como en mi PC en Steam. La suavidad de los sticks es genial y el clickeo de los botones es casi inaudible. Mi mayor problema existe en el D-pad. En esta versión del control la botonera de direcciones tiene problemas de sensibilidad y en ocasiones se puede presionar más de una dirección a la vez. En dónde me di cuenta de este error fue en Puyo Puyo Tetris, donde por la velocidad a la que juego, tiendo a mover las piezas con mucha rapidez y por ende el bajado de las piezas es necesariamente preciso. Al jugar con este D-pad en algunas ocasiones las piezas se movían al final del recorrido.Fuera de eso es un control bastante bueno para utilizarlo en casa y si no juegas muchos juegos que necesiten precisión pixel por pixel es apto para ser jugado en la PC o en la Switch.

This is definitely my favourite way to play my switch while it is docked. I have pretty big hands so they cramp up after a while playing with the grip included with the switch.  The controller takes that away and allows me to play comfortablyIf you have a switch, i promise its worth the price

This is one of the best controllers I have used. It feels great in the hand for long play sessions and I think have a better feel than the joycons. It’s similar to an xbox one controller and if you are swapping between an xbox to a switch the buttons can get confusing at first but it’ll be second nature with a few hours of play. I used this controller mostly on my PC and to my suprise it worked flawlessly. The bluetooth pairing is easy to do and there was no input lag when using it wireless altough the wired option is just as good and it comes with a wire.This is an amazing controller and if you need a controller for PC or Switch you can’t go wrong with this.
